Why Eugene AI?

The only AI task manager that actually learns from you and keeps your data private

Learns From You

Eugene tracks how long tasks actually take and when you're most productive. After just 3 completions, it knows your patterns better than you do.

Your Data, Your Drive

Everything lives in YOUR Google Drive. We never store your data on our servers. Complete privacy and ownership.

Smart Scheduling

AI-powered scheduling that considers priority, energy levels, deadlines, and your productivity patterns. Works with Google & Apple Calendar.

Email Notifications

Daily task digests, deadline reminders, and weekly insights delivered to your inbox. Stay on top of everything effortlessly.

Pattern Analytics

See when you're most productive, how accurate your estimates are, and which tasks take longer than expected. Data-driven insights.

Integrations

Connect Slack, WhatsApp, and other tools (Pro tier). Activate from settings menu. More integrations added regularly.

How Eugene Learns

Gets smarter with every task you complete

1

You Complete Tasks

Create a task: "Write Instagram carousel" (estimated 30 minutes)

2

Eugene Records Reality

Actually took 45 minutes. Eugene learns: "Carousels = 45 min, not 30"

3

Patterns Emerge

After 3+ completions: "You're 2x faster on carousels at 9am vs 3pm"

4

Eugene Gets Smarter

Next carousel: Schedules 45 minutes at 9am. Actually takes 44 min - almost perfect!

Result: Eugene goes from 60% accuracy to 98% accuracy in just a few weeks.

The only AI task manager that actually learns YOUR patterns, not generic algorithms.
